short_summary: PWGSC is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for mechanical and electrical services
description: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for to retain the services of a general contractor specializing in mechanical and electrical work to replace a boiler at La Macaza Institution.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the replacement of Boiler 2 at La Macaza Institution in Quebec.

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number:** WS4255990504-Doc4258224179
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4255990504
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-21, at 14:00:00 EST
- **Public Procurement Category:** Construction
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

### Tender Brief

The proposal seeks a general contractor with expertise in mechanical and electrical work to replace Boiler 2 at La Macaza Institution. The selected contractor will be responsible for all aspects of the project, including design, installation, and testing of the new boiler.

### Eligibility and Requirements

- Eligible contractors must have experience in non-residential building construction services and boiler installation and setup services.
- Proposals must be submitted electronically through the discovery.ariba.com platform.

### Evaluation Criteria

The PSPC will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price. Proposals must clearly demonstrate the contractor’s ability to meet the project requirements and provide a detailed breakdown of costs.

### Important Dates

- **Publication Date:** 2023-10-13
- **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-09
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** Upon completion of the tender evaluation process
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-02-08

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name:** Jessica Cossette-Fontaine, PSPC/SPAC
- **Contact Email:** jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
